definitions.definition: as stated or reported by somebody/something

examples.text: According to Mick, it's a great movie.
You've been absent six times according to our records.

definitions.definition: following, agreeing with or depending on something

examples.text: The work was done according to her instructions.
The salary will be fixed according to qualifications and experience.

definitions.definition: to do only what you have enough money to do and no more

examples.text: We wanted to buy a bigger house than this but it was a case of cutting our coat according to our cloth.
